resources.string: The source code is hosted at:\n http://github.com/fcsonline/android-setimig

This application is an open source project hosted at:
 http://github.com/fcsonline/android-setimig.
Contributors:
- Ferran Basora (fcsonline@gmail.com)

 Resources from:
- 1001FreeFonts
- Yusukekamiyamane.com (Creative Commons)

Thanks to all!

The goal is to get a 7.5. Once you get your first card you should bet. Options:
- Increase bet
- Decrease bet

Then you can:
- Hit a card
- Stand
- Special key for the first card given.

Special key:
If you get a 3, you can choose to not to play. If you get a 4 you can choose to change such card. If you get a half next to another you can choose to 'Split'. If you get a 7 you can choose to 'Dead' (7+0,5).

Score:
� Low -x1
� High x1
� 7,5 x2
� Dead x3
